Intro to Web Architecture

About Humans Preferences An Introduction to Web Architecture

Congratulations on discovering your interest in architecting the World Wide Web. The authoring abilities you will obtain bring freedom and power — and with them great responsibility.

It's an exciting time to be building the web. Let's get started.
